snippet: Bringing the efficiency of the web to common household tasks has opened a new door to the home services industry, which is estimated to be worth more than $800 billion.
abstract: Amazon becomes latest e-commerce site to dip into lucrative home services market, estimated to be worth from $400 billion to $800 billion; with Amazon Home Services, company is now competing with stalwarts like Angie's List and start-ups like Thumbtack by connecting consumers with more than 700 services, including plumbers, contractors, electricians and other manual jobs.
lead_paragraph: Bringing the efficiency of the web to common household tasks has opened a new door to the home services industry, which is estimated to be worth more than $800 billion.

headline.main: Amazon, Google and More Are Drawn to Home Services Market
headline.print_headline: Buying a Faucet From Amazon? Add a Handyman
